ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the Malaysia Ministry of Higher Education (grant number: FRGS/1/2019/STG05/UPM/02/12) and University Malaya (grant number: PG085-2012B) for awarding the research grants and the Institute of Medical Research Malaysia (IMR) for providing support with the mosquitoes and cages. We would like to also thank the volunteers for their time and participation in the repellent study and the Department of Chemistry, Faculty of Science, University Malaya for allowing the use of Zetasizer.
